channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Democrats fold on biggest government shutdown demand
item.description: Moderate Senate Democrats moved to end the government shutdown on Sunday night, abandoning the party's 40-day standoff without much to show for it. Ei...

item.title: Mamdani becomes MAGA's immigrant bogeyman
item.description: The Trump administration wants to make Zohran Mamdani , the Uganda-born Muslim who'll be New York City's next mayor, the public face for its case agai...

item.title: Democrats go ballistic over Senate shutdown deal: "People need healthcare, damn it"
item.description: Democratic lawmakers and liberal grassroots groups erupted Sunday night as moderate Senate Democrats moved to cut a deal with Republicans that would p...

item.title: Trump pardons Giuliani, 76 others accused of bid to overturn 2020 election
item.description: President Trump pardoned Rudy Giuliani and 76 other allies accused of attempting to interfere in the 2020 presidential election results, U.S. pardon a...

item.title: Reagan-era judge accuses Trump White House of "assault on the rule of law"
item.description: Mark Wolf, who resigned Friday as a senior Reagan-appointed judge, accused President Trump of "using the law for partisan purposes" in a scathing op-e...

item.title: A Rastafarian goes to the Supreme Court after a prison shaved his dreadlocks
item.description: The question is not whether Damon Landor was mistreated but whether he can sue the individual prison officials and guards for damages.

item.title: Appeals court denies Trump effort to halt full SNAP benefits for November
item.description: Back-and-forth court rulings have led to confusion and frustration over SNAP subsidies that help 42 million recipients pay for groceries.

item.title: More than 10,000 flights delayed in worst day of disruptions since shutdown
item.description: More than 2,800 flights were canceled Sunday, while Transportation Secretary Sean P. Duffy said the shutdown’s impact on airports is “only going to ge...

item.title: Late-night Senate deal opens path to ending shutdown but splits Democrats
item.description: The deal that split Democrats doesn’t extend expiring ACA subsidies. If a bill passes the Senate, it needs the House to approve and President Donald T...

item.title: These are the Democrats who broke ranks to vote for the shutdown deal
item.description: Sens. Dick Durbin, Tim Kaine and others supported a deal paving the way to end the shutdown. A final deal would need support from the House and presid...

item.title: Trump, stung by Republican losses, stands his ground on affordability
item.description: Democrats running on cost-of-living anxieties outperformed Republicans in Tuesday’s elections by greater-than-expected margins. The president chalked ...

item.title: Voters on Tuesday rewarded Democrats who addressed economic costs. Hours later, Trump said he delivered an 'economic miracle.'
item.description: A recent poll found a majority of Americans feel they’re spending more on groceries than they did a year ago.

item.title: Reaganomics in Jersey: Jack Ciattarelli has a supply-side dream if he’s elected governor this week
item.description: The Republican nominee has promised tax cuts and economic growth, but the numbers are fuzzy.

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
